But beware of the sinister Spectres lurking in the shadows... BECOME A WRAITH Move through walls, track the movement of other spirits, and manipulate objects at a distance to uncover the truth of how you met your end. EXPLORE THE BARCLAY MANSION The Barclay Mansion is an opulent residence filled with Hollywood decadence, occult research, and terrifying monsters. With few ways to defend yourself, you must avoid and outwit these lost souls.
